summary: This bill, the Reserve Organization of America Charter Amendments Act of 2025, amends the charter of the Reserve Organization of America. It outlines the organization's federal charter, perpetual existence, purposes (supporting military policy), membership eligibility, governing body, powers, exclusive rights to its name and emblems, restrictions (profit, stock, political activities, distributions), headquarters, record-keeping, service of process, and liability. The bill also includes a clerical amendment to the U.S. Code and clarifies references to the organization.
